document_data.name: Bone spider
document_data.refs3e: {{Cite web/Neverwinter Nights 2 - Creature Feature: Bone spider}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Bone spiders''' were a type of [[construct]] that resembled a [[spider]] and were made of specially treated bones.
document_data.Behavior: These constructs had intelligence comparable to that of a feral spider, but were capable of understanding simple commands.
document_data.Abilities: The fangs of these constructs with laced by their creators with a deadly [[magic]]al [[poison]].
document_data.Combat: These creatures fought in a similar manner to actual spiders.
document_data.History: A smaller variety of these constructs were frequently used by the [[drow]] [[wizard]] [[Valan Jaelre]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
